<h2><span id=".E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="注释">注释</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;section=29" title="编辑章节：注释">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div id="references-NoteFoot"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-9"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-9">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">後人在許多場合經常錯誤呼喚馬克思「卡爾·海因里希·馬克思」（Karl Heinrich Marx），實際上馬克思的出生證明上僅寫有「卡爾·馬克思」，並且在其他場合也是使用該姓名。馬克思本人僅在他的詩集與博士論文成績單上署名「K·H·馬克思」，主要原因是馬克思希望紀念於1838年逝世的父親，並且僅在3個文件中稱呼自己為「卡爾·海因里希」。雖然恩格斯在為《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Handwörterbuch der Staatswissenschaften" data-lang-code="de" data-lang-name="德语" data-orig-title="政治科學全書"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%B8%E5%85%A8%E6%9B%B8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="政治科學全書（页面不存在）">政治科學全書</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">德语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Handw%C3%B6rterbuch_der_Staatswissenschaften" title="de:Handwörterbuch der Staatswissenschaften"><span dir="auto" lang="de">Handwörterbuch der Staatswissenschaften</span></a></span>）</span></span>》編寫馬克思相關內容時以「卡爾·海因里希·馬克思」為標題<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-6"><a href="#cite_note-6">[6]</a></sup>，但並沒有證實馬克思的名字中使用中間名<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-7"><a href="#cite_note-7">[7]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-8"><a href="#cite_note-8">[8]</a></sup>。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-11"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-11">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">「Marx」的中文译名寫法从西元1902年到1923年被異的译写，1923被统一為「马克思」。「Marx」最少曾有10类不同的译名：麦喀士、马陆科斯、马尔克、马儿克、马可思、马克司、斯、思、马尔格时、马格士。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-10"><a href="#cite_note-10">[9]</a></sup></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-82"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-82">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">有關馬克思專門寫給燕妮的情詩，後來在馬克思逝世後收錄在《<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E6%81%A9%E6%A0%BC%E6%96%AF%E9%81%B8%E9%9B%86" title="馬克思恩格斯選集">馬克思恩格斯選集</a>》中<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-81"><a href="#cite_note-81">[79]</a></sup>。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-86"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-86">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">馬克思撰寫的博士論文《<a href="/wiki/%E5%BE%B7%E8%AC%A8%E5%85%8B%E5%88%A9%E7%89%B9%E7%9A%84%E8%87%AA%E7%84%B6%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E5%92%8C%E4%BC%8A%E6%AF%94%E9%B3%A9%E9%AD%AF%E7%9A%84%E8%87%AA%E7%84%B6%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E4%B9%8B%E5%8D%80%E5%88%A5" title="德謨克利特的自然哲學和伊比鳩魯的自然哲學之區別">德謨克利特的自然哲學和伊比鳩魯的自然哲學之區別</a>》後來僅剩下部分內容獲得流傳，在馬克思逝世後則收錄在《<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E6%81%A9%E6%A0%BC%E6%96%AF%E9%81%B8%E9%9B%86" title="馬克思恩格斯選集">馬克思恩格斯選集</a>》中<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-85"><a href="#cite_note-85">[82]</a></sup>。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-135"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-135">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">不過相較於路德維希·安德列斯·費爾巴哈對於馬克思的影響討論，麥克斯·施蒂納等哲學家對於馬克思歷史唯物主義的研究則較少被討論<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Ernie_Thomson_134-0"><a href="#cite_note-Ernie_Thomson-134">[130]</a></sup>。</span>
</li>
</ol></div>
<h2><span id=".E5.8F.82.E8.80.83.E6.96.87.E7.8C.AE"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="参考文献">参考文献</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;section=30" title="编辑章节：参考文献">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span id=".E8.A8.BB.E8.85.B3"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="註腳">註腳</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;section=31" title="编辑章节：註腳">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="reflist columns references-column-count references-column-count-3" style="-moz-column-count: 3; -webkit-column-count: 3; column-count: 3; list-style-type: decimal;">
<ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">龚刃韧. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160304080420/http://www.hrol.org/do/view/?aid=3366" rel="nofollow">马克思的新闻出版观：被冷落的理论</a>. <a href="/wiki/%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6%E6%B3%95%E5%AD%A6%E9%99%A2" title="北京大学法学院">北京大學法學院</a>. 2013-05-24 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.hrol.org/do/view/?aid=3366" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2016-03-04） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（中国大陆）网页">（中文（中国大陆））</span>. <q>谈到世界近代史上关于言论出版自由的经典理论，人们首先会想到相隔两个世纪的两位英国思想家的名著，即约翰·弥尔顿（John Millton）的《论出版自由》（1644年）和约翰·斯图亚特·密尔（John Stuart Mill）的《论自由》。然而，长期以来人们对马克思的印象似乎更多地停留在他对政治经济学、历史哲学以及社会主义理论方面的影响，而他的关于新闻出版自由的理论却由于种种原因而受到冷落。</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E9%BE%9A%E5%88%83%E9%9F%A7&amp;rft.btitle=%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E7%9A%84%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E8%A7%82%EF%BC%9A%E8%A2%AB%E5%86%B7%E8%90%BD%E7%9A%84%E7%90%86%E8%AE%BA&amp;rft.date=2013-05-24&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E6%B3%95%E5%AD%B8%E9%99%A2&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.hrol.org%2Fdo%2Fview%2F%3Faid%3D3366&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210318042623/https://www.200jahre.uni-bonn.de/de/geschichte/beruehmte-studenten" rel="nofollow">Berühmte Bonner Studenten im 19. Jahrhundert — 200 Jahre Uni Bonn</a>. www.200jahre.uni-bonn.de.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2018-05-31</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="https://www.200jahre.uni-bonn.de/de/geschichte/beruehmte-studenten" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2021-03-18） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到德语网页">（德语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.atitle=Ber%C3%BChmte+Bonner+Studenten+im+19.+Jahrhundert+%E2%80%94+200+Jahre+Uni+Bonn&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=www.200jahre.uni-bonn.de&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.200jahre.uni-bonn.de%2Fde%2Fgeschichte%2Fberuehmte-studenten&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-3"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">Friedrich, Kai. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20201026215037/https://www4.uni-jena.de/Kustodie/Marx+im+Depot.html" rel="nofollow">Marx im Depot</a>. www.uni-jena.de.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2018-05-31</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="https://www.uni-jena.de/Kustodie/Marx+im+Depot.html" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2020-10-26） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到德语网页">（德语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.atitle=Marx+im+Depot&amp;rft.aufirst=Kai&amp;rft.aulast=Friedrich&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=www.uni-jena.de&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.uni-jena.de%2FKustodie%2FMarx%2Bim%2BDepot.html&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-共產黨宣言-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-共產黨宣言_4-0"><sup><b>4.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-共產黨宣言_4-1"><sup><b>4.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-共產黨宣言_4-2"><sup><b>4.2</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-共產黨宣言_4-3"><sup><b>4.3</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-共產黨宣言_4-4"><sup><b>4.4</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">卡爾·馬克思和<a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E9%87%8C%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E6%81%A9%E6%A0%BC%E6%96%AF" title="弗里德里希·恩格斯">弗里德里希·恩格斯</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=rRf56dMiudAC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW" rel="nofollow">《共產黨宣言》（The Communist Manifesto）</a>. Echo Library. 2009-01-01: 全册 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1406851748" title="Special:网络书源/978-1406851748"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1406851748</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114931/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=rRf56dMiudAC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021-02-01） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>. <q>First published in 1848, "The Communist Manifest" is one of the world's most influential political tracts. Commissioned by the Communist League and written by communist theorists Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels, it laid out the League's purposes and program.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E5%92%8C%E5%BC%97%E9%87%8C%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E6%81%A9%E6%A0%BC%E6%96%AF&amp;rft.btitle=%E3%80%8A%E5%85%B1%E7%94%A2%E9%BB%A8%E5%AE%A3%E8%A8%80%E3%80%8B%EF%BC%88The+Communist+Manifesto%EF%BC%89&amp;rft.date=2009-01-01&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1406851748&amp;rft.pages=%E5%85%A8%E5%86%8C&amp;rft.pub=Echo+Library&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DrRf56dMiudAC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-马克思_全册-5"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-马克思_全册_5-0"><sup><b>5.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-马克思_全册_5-1"><sup><b>5.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">马克思. <a class="external text" href="https://book.douban.com/subject/1014722/" rel="nofollow">《资本论》节选本</a>. 北京: 人民出版社. 1998-12: 全册 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2016-10-02</span>]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/9787010027470" title="Special:网络书源/9787010027470"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 9787010027470</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114236/https://book.douban.com/subject/1014722/" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021-02-01） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（中国大陆）网页">（中文（中国大陆））</span>. <q>《资本论》是马克思用毕生精力写成的一部具有划时代意义的经济学巨著。其中第一卷研究资本的生产过程，第二卷研究资本的流通过程，第三卷分析资本主义生产的总过程。</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=%E3%80%8A%E8%B5%84%E6%9C%AC%E8%AE%BA%E3%80%8B%E8%8A%82%E9%80%89%E6%9C%AC&amp;rft.date=1998-12&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=9787010027470&amp;rft.pages=%E5%85%A8%E5%86%8C&amp;rft.place=%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC&amp;rft.pub=%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbook.douban.com%2Fsubject%2F1014722%2F&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-6"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-6">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">卡爾·馬克思和弗里德里希·恩格斯. 《馬克思恩格斯選集》第22卷. 美國紐約: International Publishers. 1986年: 337-345 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-7"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-7">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Heinz Monz. <a class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/discover/10.2307/40883645?uid=30789&amp;uid=3739216&amp;uid=30787&amp;uid=2&amp;uid=384900201&amp;uid=3&amp;uid=67&amp;uid=62&amp;uid=5909896&amp;sid=21106338225741" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx. </li>
<li id="cite_note-8"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-8">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Heinz Monz. <a class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/discover/10.2307/40883645?uid=30789&amp;uid=3739216&amp;uid=30787&amp;uid=2&amp;uid=384900201&amp;uid=3&amp;uid=67&amp;uid=62&amp;uid=5909896&amp;sid=21106338225741" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx. Grundlagen der Entwicklung zu Leben und Werk</a>. 德國特里爾: NCO-Verlag. 1973年: 第354頁 [2015-05-09] <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到德語网页">（德文）</span>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-10"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-10">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20161027125643/http://www.englisher.net/dict/en/Karl+Marx/" rel="nofollow">马克思译名来历</a>.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2016-10-27</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.englisher.net/dict/en/Karl+Marx/" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2016-10-27）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E8%AF%91%E5%90%8D%E6%9D%A5%E5%8E%86&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.englisher.net%2Fdict%2Fen%2FKarl%2BMarx%2F&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-12"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-12">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%A5%88%E7%B6%AD%E4%BF%A1" title="祈維信">祈維信</a>. <a class="external text" href="http://www.dailymail.co.uk/home/moslive/article-2014647/Karl-Marx-John-Maynard-Keynes-Ten-greatest-economists-Vince-Cable.html" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx to John Maynard Keynes: Ten of the greatest economists by Vince Cable</a>. 《<a href="/wiki/%E6%AF%8F%E6%97%A5%E9%83%B5%E5%A0%B1" title="每日郵報">每日郵報</a>》. 2011-07-16 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20180708121130/http://www.dailymail.co.uk/home/moslive/article-2014647/Karl-Marx-John-Maynard-Keynes-Ten-greatest-economists-Vince-Cable.html" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2018-07-08） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E7%A5%88%E7%B6%AD%E4%BF%A1&amp;rft.btitle=Karl+Marx+to+John+Maynard+Keynes%3A+Ten+of+the+greatest+economists+by+Vince+Cable&amp;rft.date=2011-07-16&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E3%80%8A%E6%AF%8F%E6%97%A5%E9%83%B5%E5%A0%B1%E3%80%8B&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.dailymail.co.uk%2Fhome%2Fmoslive%2Farticle-2014647%2FKarl-Marx-John-Maynard-Keynes-Ten-greatest-economists-Vince-Cable.html&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-13"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-13">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%BD%97%E4%BC%AF%E6%89%98%C2%B7%E6%9B%BC%E6%A0%BC%E8%B4%9D%E6%8B%89%C2%B7%E6%98%82%E6%A0%BC" title="罗伯托·曼格贝拉·昂格">羅伯托·曼格貝拉·昂格</a>. <a class="external text" href="http://press.princeton.edu/chapters/s_8473.pdf" rel="nofollow">Free Trade Reimagined: The World Division of Labor and the Method of Economics</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20160604104530/http://press.princeton.edu/chapters/s_8473.pdf" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）. 美國普林斯頓: <a href="/wiki/%E6%99%AE%E6%9E%97%E6%96%AF%E9%A0%93%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="普林斯頓大學出版社">普林斯頓大學出版社</a>. 2007年 [2015年5月9日] <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-14"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-14">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/%E7%BA%A6%E7%BF%B0%C2%B7%E5%B8%8C%E5%85%8B%E6%96%AF" title="约翰·希克斯">約翰·希克斯</a>. <a class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/stable/1816058?seq=1#page_scan_tab_contents" rel="nofollow">Capital Controversies: Ancient and Modern</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210103022631/http://www.jstor.org/stable/1816058?seq=1#page_scan_tab_contents" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）. 美國納許維爾: 《<a href="/wiki/%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E7%B6%93%E6%BF%9F%E8%A9%95%E8%AB%96" title="美國經濟評論">美國經濟評論</a>》. 1974年5月: 第307頁 [2015-05-09] <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span>. "The greatest economists, Smith or Marx or Keynes, have changed the course of history……"</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-15"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-15">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E7%BA%A6%E7%91%9F%E5%A4%AB%C2%B7%E7%86%8A%E5%BD%BC%E7%89%B9" title="约瑟夫·熊彼特">約瑟夫·熊彼特</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=2NqJAgAAQBAJ&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Ten Great Economists</a>. 英國倫敦: <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%BE%85%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%87" title="羅德里奇">羅德里奇</a>. 1997-11-06 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0415110785" title="Special:网络书源/978-0415110785"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0415110785</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114304/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=2NqJAgAAQBAJ&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021-02-01） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E7%B4%84%E7%91%9F%E5%A4%AB%C2%B7%E7%86%8A%E5%BD%BC%E7%89%B9&amp;rft.btitle=Ten+Great+Economists&amp;rft.date=1997-11-06&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0415110785&amp;rft.place=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E5%80%AB%E6%95%A6&amp;rft.pub=%E7%BE%85%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%87&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3D2NqJAgAAQBAJ%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-16"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-16">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="http://philosophy.hk01.com/%E8%B6%A3%E5%91%B3%E8%B2%BC%E5%9C%96/49651/%E3%80%90%E7%84%A1%E7%9D%A1%E6%84%8F%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E8%AA%B2%E3%80%91%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%EF%BC%88%E4%B8%8A%EF%BC%89%EF%BC%9A%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E4%B8%BB%E7%BE%A9%E7%9A%84%E5%8D%B1%E6%A9%9F" rel="nofollow">【無睡意哲學課】馬克思（上）：資本主義的危機</a>. 張恩源. 2016-10-20 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2016-10-02</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20161023124835/http://philosophy.hk01.com/%E8%B6%A3%E5%91%B3%E8%B2%BC%E5%9C%96/49651/%E3%80%90%E7%84%A1%E7%9D%A1%E6%84%8F%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E8%AA%B2%E3%80%91%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%EF%BC%88%E4%B8%8A%EF%BC%89%EF%BC%9A%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E4%B8%BB%E7%BE%A9%E7%9A%84%E5%8D%B1%E6%A9%9F" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2016-10-23） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（中国大陆）网页">（中文（中国大陆））</span>. <q>卡爾．馬克思（Karl Marx，1818-1883）生前從未自稱「社會學家」，相反，他對「社會學」一詞的發明者孔德(Auguste Comte)有著無情的嘲諷與蔑視。然而，<b>馬克思還是被公認為當代社會（科）學的重要鼻祖</b>，大量的社會學概念與方法源自對他的回應。他的思想縱跨三個世紀，橫掃東方西方，至今活力不減，火力未衰。</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=%E3%80%90%E7%84%A1%E7%9D%A1%E6%84%8F%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E8%AA%B2%E3%80%91%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%EF%BC%88%E4%B8%8A%EF%BC%89%EF%BC%9A%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E4%B8%BB%E7%BE%A9%E7%9A%84%E5%8D%B1%E6%A9%9F&amp;rft.date=2016-10-20&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E5%BC%B5%E6%81%A9%E6%BA%90&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fphilosophy.hk01.com%2F%25E8%25B6%25A3%25E5%2591%25B3%25E8%25B2%25BC%25E5%259C%2596%2F49651%2F%25E3%2580%2590%25E7%2584%25A1%25E7%259D%25A1%25E6%2584%258F%25E5%2593%25B2%25E5%25AD%25B8%25E8%25AA%25B2%25E3%2580%2591%25E9%25A6%25AC%25E5%2585%258B%25E6%2580%259D%25EF%25BC%2588%25E4%25B8%258A%25EF%25BC%2589%25EF%25BC%259A%25E8%25B3%2587%25E6%259C%25AC%25E4%25B8%25BB%25E7%25BE%25A9%25E7%259A%2584%25E5%258D%25B1%25E6%25A9%259F&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-17"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-17">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://www.uni-bonn.de/einrichtungen/universitaetsverwaltung/organisationsplan/archiv/universitaetsmuseum/marxchinesisch" rel="nofollow">卡尔·马克思波恩的求学之路</a>.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2016-10-02</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20200925235305/https://www.uni-bonn.de/einrichtungen/universitaetsverwaltung/organisationsplan/archiv/universitaetsmuseum/marxchinesisch" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2020-09-25） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（中国大陆）网页">（中文（中国大陆））</span>. <q>1835年10月，卡尔·马克思中学毕业来到波恩，并且在波恩大学的法学专业注册。鉴于受当时“迫害民众领袖运动”的影响，普鲁士政府压制当时思想上的民主意识。因此，学生是不允许有政治倾向的。在这一做法上，波恩大学较其他大学没有明显的区别。禁止大学学生联合会也是国家思想禁锢的手段之一。因此，当 1835 至 1836 年冬季学期马克思开始他在波恩大学的学习时，大学中并没有官方大学生联合会组织的。尽管如此，学生们还是为了一同出游或者是为了便于决斗而在私下里秘密聚会。这在当时是学生身份的一个重要标志。这些组织和活动能有效地将来自特里尔地区的学生们团结在一起。他们在波恩附近组织郊游和等活动。</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E6%B3%A2%E6%81%A9%E7%9A%84%E6%B1%82%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%8B%E8%B7%AF&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.uni-bonn.de%2Feinrichtungen%2Funiversitaetsverwaltung%2Forganisationsplan%2Farchiv%2Funiversitaetsmuseum%2Fmarxchinesisch&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-18"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-18">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20161003101632/http://max.book118.com/html/2015/0603/18317740.shtm" rel="nofollow">中国大百科全书外国历史（2）.pdf</a>. 2015-06-03 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2016-10-02</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://max.book118.com/html/2015/0603/18317740.shtm" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2016-10-03） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（中国大陆）网页">（中文（中国大陆））</span>. <q>马克思为了发展和壮大民主力量，参加科隆民主协会和科隆工人联合会的工作，同这些组织中的错误倾向……</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%A7%E7%99%BE%E7%A7%91%E5%85%A8%E4%B9%A6%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E5%8E%86%E5%8F%B2%EF%BC%882%EF%BC%89.pdf&amp;rft.date=2015-06-03&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fmax.book118.com%2Fhtml%2F2015%2F0603%2F18317740.shtm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-19"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-19">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">卡爾·馬克思. <a class="external text" href="https://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/1845/german-ideology/ch01b.htm" rel="nofollow">Part I: Feuerbach. Opposition of the Materialist and Idealist Outlook</a>. 《<a href="/wiki/%E5%BE%B7%E6%84%8F%E5%BF%97%E6%84%8F%E8%AD%98%E5%BD%A2%E6%85%8B" title="德意志意識形態">德意志意識形態</a>》. 1845 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150102205347/http://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/1845/german-ideology/ch01b.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2015-01-02） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>. <q>For each new class which puts itself in the place of one ruling before it, is compelled, merely in order to carry through its aim, to represent its interest as the common interest of all the members of society, that is, expressed in ideal form: it has to give its ideas the form of universality, and represent them as the only rational, universally valid ones.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=Part+I%3A+Feuerbach.+Opposition+of+the+Materialist+and+Idealist+Outlook&amp;rft.date=1845&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E3%80%8A%E5%BE%B7%E6%84%8F%E5%BF%97%E6%84%8F%E8%AD%98%E5%BD%A2%E6%85%8B%E3%80%8B&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marxists.org%2Farchive%2Fmarx%2Fworks%2F1845%2Fgerman-ideology%2Fch01b.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-20"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-20">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation news"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210409022313/http://www.cqvip.com/qk/82820a/1998003/3000915044.html" rel="nofollow">马克思主义的国家消亡理论与全球一体化</a>. 《青海民族大学学报：社会科学版》1998年 第3期.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2020-11-22</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.cqvip.com/qk/82820a/1998003/3000915044.html" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2021-04-09）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.atitle=%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E7%9A%84%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E6%B6%88%E4%BA%A1%E7%90%86%E8%AE%BA%E4%B8%8E%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E4%B8%80%E4%BD%93%E5%8C%96&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.cqvip.com%2Fqk%2F82820a%2F1998003%2F3000915044.html&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-21"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-21">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">卡爾·馬克思. <a class="external text" href="https://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/1875/gotha/index.htm" rel="nofollow">Critique of the Gotha Programme</a>. 《<a href="/wiki/%E5%93%A5%E8%BE%BE%E7%BA%B2%E9%A2%86%E6%89%B9%E5%88%A4" title="哥达纲领批判">哥達綱領批判</a>》. 1875年 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20171020022542/https://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/1875/gotha/index.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2017-10-20） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>. <q>Critique of the Gotha Programme is a critique of the draft programme of the United Workers' Party of Germany. In this document Marx address the dictatorship of the proletariat, the period of transition from capitalism to communism, the two phases of communist society, the production and distribution of the social goods, proletarian internationalism, and the party of the working class.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=Critique+of+the+Gotha+Programme&amp;rft.date=1875&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E3%80%8A%E5%93%A5%E9%81%94%E7%B6%B1%E9%A0%98%E6%89%B9%E5%88%A4%E3%80%8B&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marxists.org%2Farchive%2Fmarx%2Fworks%2F1875%2Fgotha%2Findex.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-22"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-22">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">卡爾·馬克思和弗里德里希·恩格斯. 《馬克思恩格斯選集》第3卷. 美國紐約: International Publishers. 1975年: 第13頁至第30頁 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-23"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-23">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">卡爾·馬克思和弗里德里希·恩格斯. 《馬克思恩格斯選集》第39卷. 美國紐約: International Publishers. 1983年: 第58頁 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-Craig_Calhoun_23-24-24"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_23-24_24-0"><sup><b>22.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_23-24_24-1"><sup><b>22.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_23-24_24-2"><sup><b>22.2</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_23-24_24-3"><sup><b>22.3</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_23-24_24-4"><sup><b>22.4</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Craig Calhoun、Joseph Gerteis、James Moody、Steven Pfaff、Kathryn Schmidt和Indermohan Virk. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=qlmBgDM-shoC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Classical Sociological Theory</a>. 美國霍博肯: <a href="/wiki/%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E5%A8%81%E7%AB%8B" title="約翰威立">約翰威立</a>(Craig Calhoun). 2002-04-10: 23–24 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0631213482" title="Special:网络书源/978-0631213482"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0631213482</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114325/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=qlmBgDM-shoC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021-02-01） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-英國廣播公司-25"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-英國廣播公司_25-0"><sup><b>23.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-英國廣播公司_25-1"><sup><b>23.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/461545.stm" rel="nofollow">World Marx the millennium's 'greatest thinker<span style="padding-right:0.2em;">'</span></a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E5%BB%A3%E6%92%AD%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8" title="英國廣播公司">英國廣播公司</a>. 1999-10-01 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20170902192653/http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/461545.stm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2017-09-02） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=World+Marx+the+millennium%27s+%27greatest+thinker%27&amp;rft.date=1999-10-01&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E5%BB%A3%E6%92%AD%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fnews.bbc.co.uk%2F1%2Fhi%2F461545.stm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-Max_Weber-26"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Max_Weber_26-0"><sup><b>24.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Max_Weber_26-1"><sup><b>24.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">Sung Ho Kim. <a class="external text" href="http://plato.stanford.edu/entries/weber/" rel="nofollow">Max Weber</a>. <a href="/wiki/%E5%8F%B2%E4%B8%B9%E4%BD%9B%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E7%99%BE%E7%A7%91%E5%85%A8%E6%9B%B8" title="史丹佛哲學百科全書">史丹佛哲學百科全書</a>. 2012-07-31 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20200527021109/https://plato.stanford.edu/entries/weber/" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2020-05-27） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>. <q>Max Weber is known as a principal architect of modern social science along with Karl Marx and Emil Durkheim.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=Sung+Ho+Kim&amp;rft.btitle=Max+Weber&amp;rft.date=2012-07-31&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E5%8F%B2%E4%B8%B9%E4%BD%9B%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E7%99%BE%E7%A7%91%E5%85%A8%E6%9B%B8&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fplato.stanford.edu%2Fentries%2Fweber%2F&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-30"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-30">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E6%88%B4%E7%B6%AD%C2%B7%E9%BA%A5%E5%85%8B%E8%90%8A%E5%80%AB_(%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB%E5%AD%B8%E5%AE%B6)" title="戴維·麥克萊倫 (政治學家)">戴維·麥克萊倫</a>. <li id="cite_note-32"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-32">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E9%AE%91%E9%87%8C%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E5%B0%BC%E5%8F%A4%E6%8B%89%E5%A4%AB%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA" title="鮑里斯·尼古拉夫斯基">鮑里斯·尼古拉夫斯基</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/karlmarxmanandfi029120mbp" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx - Man And Fighter</a>. <li id="cite_note-Ernie_Thomson-134"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Ernie_Thomson_134-0"><sup><b>130.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Ernie_Thomson_134-1"><sup><b>130.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Ernie Thomson. <li id="cite_note-151"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-151">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E9%87%8C%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E6%81%A9%E6%A0%BC%E6%96%AF" title="弗里德里希·恩格斯">弗里德里希·恩格斯</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=064sjJmlCVsC&amp;hl=zh-TW" rel="nofollow">《社會主義從空想到科學的發展》（Socialism: Utopian and Scientific）</a>. <li id="cite_note-Imported_Pubn_89-156"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Imported_Pubn_89_156-0"><sup><b>151.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Imported_Pubn_89_156-1"><sup><b>151.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Imported_Pubn_89_156-2"><sup><b>151.2</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">P. <li id="cite_note-177"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-177">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E6%88%B4%E7%B6%AD%C2%B7%E9%BA%A5%E5%85%8B%E8%90%8A%E5%80%AB_(%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB%E5%AD%B8%E5%AE%B6)" title="戴維·麥克萊倫 (政治學家)">戴維·麥克萊倫</a>. 《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Karl Marx: His Life and Thought" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="卡爾·馬克思：他的生活與思想"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%EF%BC%9A%E4%BB%96%E7%9A%84%E7%94%9F%E6%B4%BB%E8%88%87%E6%80%9D%E6%83%B3&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="卡爾·馬克思：他的生活與思想（页面不存在）">卡爾·馬克思：他的生活與思想</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karl_Marx:_His_Life_and_Thought" title="en:Karl Marx: His Life and Thought"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Karl Marx: His Life and Thought</span></a></span>）</span></span>》. 美國紐約: <a href="/wiki/%E5%93%88%E7%8F%80%E6%9F%AF%E6%9E%97%E6%96%AF" title="哈珀柯林斯">哈珀柯林斯</a>. 1974年: 第189頁至第190頁. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0060128296" title="Special:网络书源/978-0060128296"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0060128296</a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; Resistance Books. : 第6頁 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1876646196" title="Special:网络书源/978-1876646196"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1876646196</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114435/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=xlYfFDJDXewC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=The+Class+Struggles+in+France%3A+From+the+February+Revolution+to+the+Paris+Commune&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1876646196&amp;rft.pages=%E7%AC%AC6%E9%A0%81&amp;rft.pub=Resistance+Books&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DxlYfFDJDXewC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-弗朗西斯·惠恩_136-137-185"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-弗朗西斯·惠恩_136-137_185-0"><sup><b>180.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-弗朗西斯·惠恩_136-137_185-1"><sup><b>180.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%83%A0%E6%81%A9" title="弗朗西斯·惠恩">弗朗西斯·惠恩</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=r_3c34tQm0cC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a>. <li id="cite_note-193"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-193">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Achille Loria" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="阿希尔·洛里亚"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%98%BF%E5%B8%8C%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E6%B4%9B%E9%87%8C%E4%BA%9A&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="阿希尔·洛里亚（页面不存在）">阿希尔·洛里亚</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Achille_Loria" title="en:Achille Loria"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Achille Loria</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210103022814/http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）. 美國安娜堡: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="University of Michigan Library" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="密西根大學出版社"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%AF%86%E8%A5%BF%E6%A0%B9%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="密西根大學出版社（页面不存在）">密西根大學出版社</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Michigan_Library" title="en:University of Michigan Library"><span dir="auto" lang="en">University of Michigan Library</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 1920年1月1日: 第73頁 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-205"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-205">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Phil Harriss. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=zv6GxJzhrbgC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">London Markets</a>. <li id="cite_note-206"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-206">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">卡爾·馬克思和弗里德里希·恩格斯. 《馬克思恩格斯選集》第11卷. 美國紐約: <a href="/wiki/%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E5%95%86" title="國際出版商">國際出版商</a>. 1979年: 第99頁至第157頁 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-207"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-207">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">卡爾·馬克思. 《<a href="/wiki/%E8%B7%AF%E6%98%93%C2%B7%E6%B3%A2%E6%8B%BF%E5%B7%B4%E7%9A%84%E9%9B%BE%E6%9C%88%E5%8D%81%E5%85%AB%E6%97%A5" title="路易·波拿巴的雾月十八日">路易·波拿巴的霧月十八日</a>》（<a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=ryOVzGSq0zYC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">The 18th Brumaire of Louis Bonaparte</a>）. 美國紐約: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Wildside Press" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="Wildside Press"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Wildside_Press&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Wildside Press（页面不存在）">Wildside Press</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wildside_Press" title="en:Wildside Press"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Wildside Press</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 2008年3月30日: 第141頁. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1434463746" title="Special:网络书源/978-1434463746"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1434463746</a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-209"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-209">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Enrique Dussel" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="恩立克·杜賽爾"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%81%A9%E7%AB%8B%E5%85%8B%C2%B7%E6%9D%9C%E8%B3%BD%E7%88%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="恩立克·杜賽爾（页面不存在）">恩立克·杜賽爾</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enrique_Dussel" title="en:Enrique Dussel"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Enrique Dussel</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://www.worldcat.org/oclc/50704908" rel="nofollow">Towards An Unknown Marx: A Commentary on the Manuscripts of 1861-63</a>. 英國倫敦: <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%BE%85%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%87" title="羅德里奇">羅德里奇</a>. 2001年7月10日: 第33頁 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0415215459" title="Special:网络书源/978-0415215459"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0415215459</a>. <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/50704908" rel="nofollow"><span title="OCLC">OCLC 50704908</span></a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20200608130644/http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/50704908" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2020年6月8日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-210"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-210">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Achille Loria" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="阿希尔·洛里亚"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%98%BF%E5%B8%8C%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E6%B4%9B%E9%87%8C%E4%BA%9A&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="阿希尔·洛里亚（页面不存在）">阿希尔·洛里亚</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Achille_Loria" title="en:Achille Loria"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Achille Loria</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210103022814/http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）. 美國安娜堡: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="University of Michigan Library" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="密西根大學出版社"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%AF%86%E8%A5%BF%E6%A0%B9%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="密西根大學出版社（页面不存在）">密西根大學出版社</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Michigan_Library" title="en:University of Michigan Library"><span dir="auto" lang="en">University of Michigan Library</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 1920年1月1日: 第77頁至第78頁 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-211"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-211">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Jonathan Sperber" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="喬納森·斯珀伯"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%96%AC%E7%B4%8D%E6%A3%AE%C2%B7%E6%96%AF%E7%8F%80%E4%BC%AF&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="喬納森·斯珀伯（页面不存在）">喬納森·斯珀伯</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jonathan_Sperber" title="en:Jonathan Sperber"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Jonathan Sperber</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://www.worldcat.org/oclc/783163659" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx: A Nineteenth-Century Life</a> 1st. </li>
<li id="cite_note-224"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-224">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="John Cunningham Wood" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="約翰·科寧漢姆·伍德"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%C2%B7%E7%A7%91%E5%AF%A7%E6%BC%A2%E5%A7%86%C2%B7%E4%BC%8D%E5%BE%B7&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="約翰·科寧漢姆·伍德（页面不存在）">約翰·科寧漢姆·伍德</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Cunningham_Wood" title="en:John Cunningham Wood"><span dir="auto" lang="en">John Cunningham Wood</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=0Pr97rppN2EC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx's Economics: Critical Assessments I</a>. 英國倫敦: <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%BE%85%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%87" title="羅德里奇">羅德里奇</a>. 1987年10月14日: 第346頁 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0415065580" title="Special:网络书源/978-0415065580"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0415065580</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114604/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=0Pr97rppN2EC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-229"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-229">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Craig Calhoun、Joseph Gerteis、James Moody、Steven Pfaff、Kathryn Schmidt和Indermohan Virk. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=qlmBgDM-shoC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Classical Sociological Theory</a>. 美國霍博肯: <a href="/wiki/%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E5%A8%81%E7%AB%8B" title="約翰威立">約翰威立</a>. 2002年4月10日: 第20頁 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0631213482" title="Special:网络书源/978-0631213482"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0631213482</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114325/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=qlmBgDM-shoC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=Craig+Calhoun%E3%80%81Joseph+Gerteis%E3%80%81James+Moody%E3%80%81Steven+Pfaff%E3%80%81Kathryn+Schmidt%E5%92%8CIndermohan+Virk&amp;rft.btitle=Classical+Sociological+Theory&amp;rft.date=2002-04-10&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0631213482&amp;rft.pages=%E7%AC%AC20%E9%A0%81&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E9%9C%8D%E5%8D%9A%E8%82%AF&amp;rft.pub=%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E5%A8%81%E7%AB%8B&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DqlmBgDM-shoC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-史蒂芬·古爾德_167-168-257"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-史蒂芬·古爾德_167-168_257-0"><sup><b>252.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-史蒂芬·古爾德_167-168_257-1"><sup><b>252.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-史蒂芬·古爾德_167-168_257-2"><sup><b>252.2</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-史蒂芬·古爾德_167-168_257-3"><sup><b>252.3</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-史蒂芬·古爾德_167-168_257-4"><sup><b>252.4</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-史蒂芬·古爾德_167-168_257-5"><sup><b>252.5</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-史蒂芬·古爾德_167-168_257-6"><sup><b>252.6</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E5%8F%B2%E8%92%82%E8%8A%AC%C2%B7%E5%8F%A4%E7%88%BE%E5%BE%B7" title="史蒂芬·古爾德">史蒂芬·古爾德</a>. <li id="cite_note-Barry_S._Clark_57-59-266"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Barry_S._Clark_57-59_266-0"><sup><b>261.00</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Barry_S._Clark_57-59_266-1"><sup><b>261.01</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Barry_S._Clark_57-59_266-2"><sup><b>261.02</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Barry_S._Clark_57-59_266-3"><sup><b>261.03</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Barry_S._Clark_57-59_266-4"><sup><b>261.04</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Barry_S._Clark_57-59_266-5"><sup><b>261.05</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Barry_S._Clark_57-59_266-6"><sup><b>261.06</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Barry_S._Clark_57-59_266-7"><sup><b>261.07</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Barry_S._Clark_57-59_266-8"><sup><b>261.08</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Barry_S._Clark_57-59_266-9"><sup><b>261.09</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Barry_S._Clark_57-59_266-10"><sup><b>261.10</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Barry_S._Clark_57-59_266-11"><sup><b>261.11</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Barry S. <li id="cite_note-Critique_of_Hegel’s_Philosophy-272"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Critique_of_Hegel’s_Philosophy_272-0"><sup><b>267.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Critique_of_Hegel’s_Philosophy_272-1"><sup><b>267.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Critique_of_Hegel’s_Philosophy_272-2"><sup><b>267.2</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Critique_of_Hegel’s_Philosophy_272-3"><sup><b>267.3</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Critique_of_Hegel’s_Philosophy_272-4"><sup><b>267.4</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Critique_of_Hegel’s_Philosophy_272-5"><sup><b>267.5</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Critique_of_Hegel’s_Philosophy_272-6"><sup><b>267.6</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">卡爾·馬克思. <a class="external text" href="https://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/1844/manuscripts/hegel.htm" rel="nofollow">Critique of Hegel’s Philosophy in General</a>. 《<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/1844%E5%B9%B4%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%A6%E5%92%8C%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E5%AD%A6%E6%89%8B%E7%A8%BF" title="1844年哲学和经济学手稿">1844年哲學和經濟學手稿</a>》. 1844年 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114759/https://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/1844/manuscripts/hegel.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; </li>
<li id="cite_note-273"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-273">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">David M. Lefever和J. <li id="cite_note-279"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-279">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Paul Hernadi. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=yNGAg_yK6R4C&amp;pg=PA137&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">The Rhetoric of Interpretation and the Interpretation of Rhetoric</a>. 美國德罕: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Duke University Press" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="杜克大學出版社"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%9D%9C%E5%85%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="杜克大學出版社（页面不存在）">杜克大學出版社</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duke_University_Press" title="en:Duke University Press"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Duke University Press</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 1989年6月: 第137頁 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0822309345" title="Special:网络书源/978-0822309345"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0822309345</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210103023319/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=yNGAg_yK6R4C&amp;pg=PA137&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年1月3日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-282"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-282">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">卡爾·馬克思(Karl Marx，J. O'Malley). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=uxg4AAAAIAAJ&amp;printsec=frontcover#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">《黑格爾法哲學批判》（Critique of Hegel's 'Philosophy Of Right'）</a>. 英國劍橋: <a href="/wiki/%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="劍橋大學出版社">劍橋大學出版社</a>. 1977年8月26日: 第131頁 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0521292115" title="Special:网络书源/978-0521292115"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0521292115</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114828/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=uxg4AAAAIAAJ&amp;printsec=frontcover#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>. <q>This book is a complete translation of Marx's critical commentary on paragraphs 261-313 of Hegel's major work in political theory.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%28Karl+Marx%EF%BC%8CJ.+O%27Malley%29&amp;rft.btitle=%E3%80%8A%E9%BB%91%E6%A0%BC%E7%88%BE%E6%B3%95%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E6%89%B9%E5%88%A4%E3%80%8B%EF%BC%88Critique+of+Hegel%27s+%27Philosophy+Of+Right%27%EF%BC%89&amp;rft.date=1977-08-26&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0521292115&amp;rft.pages=%E7%AC%AC131%E9%A0%81&amp;rft.place=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B&amp;rft.pub=%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3Duxg4AAAAIAAJ%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=William+H.+Swatos+Jr.&amp;rft.btitle=Encyclopedia+of+Religion+and+Society&amp;rft.date=1998-02-05&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0761989561&amp;rft.pages=%E7%AC%AC499%E9%A0%81&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E5%96%AC%E6%B2%BB%E7%8E%8B%E5%AD%90%E7%B8%A3&amp;rft.pub=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E7%BE%85%E6%9B%BC%E5%92%8C%E5%88%A9%E7%89%B9%E7%88%BE%E8%8F%B2%E7%88%BE%E5%BE%B7%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E9%9B%86%E5%9C%98%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22Rowman+%26+Littlefield%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E7%BE%85%E6%9B%BC%E5%92%8C%E5%88%A9%E7%89%B9%E7%88%BE%E8%8F%B2%E7%88%BE%E5%BE%B7%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E9%9B%86%E5%9C%98%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3ERowman+%26+Littlefield%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3D6TMFoMFe-D8C%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-285"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-285">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Dennis Gilbert" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="丹尼斯·蓋伯特"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%B8%B9%E5%B0%BC%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E8%93%8B%E4%BC%AF%E7%89%B9&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="丹尼斯·蓋伯特（页面不存在）">丹尼斯·蓋伯特</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dennis_Gilbert" title="en:Dennis Gilbert"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Dennis Gilbert</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=hPlf4paJw3oC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">The American Class Structure in an Age of Growing Inequality</a>. 美國千橡: <a href="/wiki/%E8%B3%BD%E5%90%89%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8" title="賽吉出版公司">賽吉出版公司</a>. 2010年5月13日: 第6頁 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1412979658" title="Special:网络书源/978-1412979658"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1412979658</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114853/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=hPlf4paJw3oC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-286"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-286">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Achille Loria" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="阿希尔·洛里亚"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%98%BF%E5%B8%8C%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E6%B4%9B%E9%87%8C%E4%BA%9A&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="阿希尔·洛里亚（页面不存在）">阿希尔·洛里亚</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Achille_Loria" title="en:Achille Loria"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Achille Loria</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210103022814/http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）. 美國安娜堡: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="University of Michigan Library" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="密西根大學出版社"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%AF%86%E8%A5%BF%E6%A0%B9%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="密西根大學出版社（页面不存在）">密西根大學出版社</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Michigan_Library" title="en:University of Michigan Library"><span dir="auto" lang="en">University of Michigan Library</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 1920年1月1日: 第57頁 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span>.</span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-298"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-298">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BF%9D%E7%BE%85%C2%B7%E5%91%82%E6%A0%BC%E7%88%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="保羅·呂格爾（页面不存在）">保羅·呂格爾</a>. 《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Freud and Philosophy" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="佛洛伊德和哲學"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BD%9B%E6%B4%9B%E4%BC%8A%E5%BE%B7%E5%92%8C%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="佛洛伊德和哲學（页面不存在）">佛洛伊德和哲學</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freud_and_Philosophy" title="en:Freud and Philosophy"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Freud and Philosophy</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（<a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=oHXFRv7SUrcC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Freud and Philosophy: An Essay on Interpretation</a>）. 美國紐哈芬: <a href="/wiki/%E8%80%B6%E9%AD%AF%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="耶魯大學出版社">耶魯大學出版社</a>. 1977年9月10日: 第32頁. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0300021899" title="Special:网络书源/978-0300021899"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0300021899</a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-304"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-304">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%B7%E7%B6%AD%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E9%A6%AE%C2%B7%E7%B1%B3%E5%A1%9E%E6%96%AF" title="路德維希·馮·米塞斯">路德維希·馮·米塞斯</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://mises.org/sites/default/files/Planned%20Chaos_3.pdf" rel="nofollow">Planned Chaos</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. 美國歐本: <a href="/wiki/%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%B7%E7%B6%AD%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E9%A6%AE%C2%B7%E7%B1%B3%E5%A1%9E%E6%96%AF%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E6%89%80" title="路德維希·馮·米塞斯研究所">路德維希·馮·米塞斯研究所</a>. 2014年9月29日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1933550602" title="Special:网络书源/978-1933550602"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1933550602</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160307103252/https://mises.org/sites/default/files/Planned%20Chaos_3.pdf" rel="nofollow">存档</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>于2016年3月7日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%B7%E7%B6%AD%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E9%A6%AE%C2%B7%E7%B1%B3%E5%A1%9E%E6%96%AF&amp;rft.btitle=Planned+Chaos&amp;rft.date=2014-09-29&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1933550602&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E6%AD%90%E6%9C%AC&amp;rft.pub=%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%B7%E7%B6%AD%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E9%A6%AE%C2%B7%E7%B1%B3%E5%A1%9E%E6%96%AF%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E6%89%80&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fmises.org%2Fsites%2Fdefault%2Ffiles%2FPlanned%2520Chaos_3.pdf&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-307"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-307">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">今村仁司、三島憲一、鷲田清一和野家啟一. <a class="external text" href="https://www.worldcat.org/oclc/298591409" rel="nofollow">《马克思、尼采、弗洛伊德、胡塞尔：现代思想的源流》</a>. 中國石家莊: <a href="/wiki/%E6%B2%B3%E5%8C%97%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="河北教育出版社">河北教育出版社</a>. 2001年8月 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/7-5434-4544-1" title="Special:网络书源/7-5434-4544-1"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 7-5434-4544-1</a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（中国大陆）网页">（中文（中国大陆））</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E4%BB%8A%E6%9D%91%E4%BB%81%E5%8F%B8%E3%80%81%E4%B8%89%E5%B3%B6%E6%86%B2%E4%B8%80%E3%80%81%E9%B7%B2%E7%94%B0%E6%B8%85%E4%B8%80%E5%92%8C%E9%87%8E%E5%AE%B6%E5%95%9F%E4%B8%80&amp;rft.btitle=%E3%80%8A%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E3%80%81%E5%B0%BC%E9%87%87%E3%80%81%E5%BC%97%E6%B4%9B%E4%BC%8A%E5%BE%B7%E3%80%81%E8%83%A1%E5%A1%9E%E5%B0%94%EF%BC%9A%E7%8E%B0%E4%BB%A3%E6%80%9D%E6%83%B3%E7%9A%84%E6%BA%90%E6%B5%81%E3%80%8B&amp;rft.date=2001-08&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=7-5434-4544-1&amp;rft.place=%E4%B8%AD%E5%9C%8B%E7%9F%B3%E5%AE%B6%E8%8E%8A&amp;rft.pub=%E6%B2%B3%E5%8C%97%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.worldcat.org%2Foclc%2F298591409&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E5%91%82%E8%BF%AA%E6%A0%BC%C2%B7%E8%96%A9%E5%BC%97%E8%98%AD%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22R%C3%BCdiger+Safranski%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E5%91%82%E8%BF%AA%E6%A0%BC%C2%B7%E8%96%A9%E5%BC%97%E8%98%AD%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3ER%C3%BCdiger+Safranski%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft.btitle=Martin+Heidegger%3A+Between+Good+and+Evil&amp;rft.date=1999-11-01&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0674387102&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B&amp;rft.pub=%E5%93%88%E4%BD%9B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DDX47SpX5cnMC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-周穗明-309"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-周穗明_309-0"><sup><b>304.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-周穗明_309-1"><sup><b>304.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">周穗明. <a class="external text" href="http://news.xinhuanet.com/theory/2011-04/11/c_121289059.htm" rel="nofollow">在“西方马克思主义”旗下对资本主义社会的全面批判</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%96%B0%E8%8F%AF%E7%B6%B2" title="新華網">新華網</a>. 2011年4月11日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20130129041054/http://news.xinhuanet.com/theory/2011-04/11/c_121289059.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2013-01-29） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（简体）网页">（中文（简体））</span>. <q>法兰克福学派是20世纪西方新马克思主义中最大的流派，也是至今仍保持强大文化影响力的西方主要学术流派之一。法兰克福学派在当代西方思想史上享有重要地位。在大半个世纪的发展过程中，法兰克福学派从开始运用马克思批判资本主义的现成结论去度量现代资本主义，到把马克思主义与各种现代西方社会思潮相结合，再到最终形成一套独立的社会批判规范和方法，在“西方马克思主义”的旗下对现代资本主义社会进行了全面的批判。尽管社会批判理论有其局限性，但是它在当代哲学、社会学、传播学和文化研究的各个领域中受到广泛的重视和应用，至今仍然是西方新马克思主义中“生存得最好的”流派（安德森语）。</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%91%A8%E7%A9%97%E6%98%8E&amp;rft.btitle=%E5%9C%A8%E2%80%9C%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%B9%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E2%80%9D%E6%97%97%E4%B8%8B%E5%AF%B9%E8%B5%84%E6%9C%AC%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E7%A4%BE%E4%BC%9A%E7%9A%84%E5%85%A8%E9%9D%A2%E6%89%B9%E5%88%A4&amp;rft.date=2011-04-11&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E6%96%B0%E8%8F%AF%E7%B6%B2&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fnews.xinhuanet.com%2Ftheory%2F2011-04%2F11%2Fc_121289059.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-310"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-310">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E8%8E%B1%E8%B0%A2%E5%85%8B%C2%B7%E7%A7%91%E6%8B%89%E7%A7%91%E5%A4%AB%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA" title="莱谢克·科拉科夫斯基">萊謝克·科拉科夫斯基</a>. 《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Main Currents of Marxism" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="馬克思主義的主流流派"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E4%B8%BB%E7%BE%A9%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%BB%E6%B5%81%E6%B5%81%E6%B4%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="馬克思主義的主流流派（页面不存在）">馬克思主義的主流流派</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Currents_of_Marxism" title="en:Main Currents of Marxism"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Main Currents of Marxism</span></a></span>）</span></span>》. 美國紐約: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="W. W. Norton &amp; Company" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="諾頓出版公司"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%AB%BE%E9%A0%93%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="諾頓出版公司（页面不存在）">諾頓出版公司</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/W._W._Norton_%26_Company" title="en:W. W. Norton &amp; Company"><span dir="auto" lang="en">W. W. Norton &amp; Company</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 2008年1月17日. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0393329438" title="Special:网络书源/978-0393329438"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0393329438</a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;"
