<li id="cite_note-311"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-311">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E9%9B%B7%E8%92%99%C2%B7%E9%98%BF%E9%9A%86" title="雷蒙·阿隆">雷蒙·阿隆</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=IIJ2ASK9Lc8C&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Main Currents in Sociological Thought: Montesquieu, Comte, Marx, deTocqueville, Sociologists and the Revolution of 1848</a>. 美國皮斯卡特維: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Transaction Publishers" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="Transaction Publishers"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Transaction_Publishers&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Transaction Publishers（页面不存在）">Transaction Publishers</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transaction_Publishers" title="en:Transaction Publishers"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Transaction Publishers</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 1998年4月30日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0765804013" title="Special:网络书源/978-0765804013"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0765804013</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210103023431/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=IIJ2ASK9Lc8C&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年1月3日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E9%9B%B7%E8%92%99%C2%B7%E9%98%BF%E9%9A%86&amp;rft.btitle=Main+Currents+in+Sociological+Thought%3A+Montesquieu%2C+Comte%2C+Marx%2C+deTocqueville%2C+Sociologists+and+the+Revolution+of+1848&amp;rft.date=1998-04-30&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0765804013&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E7%9A%AE%E6%96%AF%E5%8D%A1%E7%89%B9%E7%B6%AD&amp;rft.pub=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22Transaction+Publishers%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22Transaction+Publishers%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3ETransaction+Publishers%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3ETransaction+Publishers%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DIIJ2ASK9Lc8C%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-312"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-312">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E4%BD%A9%E9%87%8C%C2%B7%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%B7%E6%A3%AE" title="佩里·安德森">佩里·安德森</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150525103602/https://zh.scribd.com/doc/46229953/Perry-Anderson-Considerations-on-Western-Marxism#scribd" rel="nofollow">Considerations on Western Marxism</a>. Verso Books. 1976年9月16日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0860917205" title="Special:网络书源/978-0860917205"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0860917205</a>. （<a class="external text" href="https://zh.scribd.com/doc/46229953/Perry-Anderson-Considerations-on-Western-Marxism#scribd" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2015年5月25日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E4%BD%A9%E9%87%8C%C2%B7%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%B7%E6%A3%AE&amp;rft.btitle=Considerations+on+Western+Marxism&amp;rft.date=1976-09-16&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0860917205&amp;rft.pub=Verso+Books&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fzh.scribd.com%2Fdoc%2F46229953%2FPerry-Anderson-Considerations-on-Western-Marxism%23scribd&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-313"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-313">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E8%89%BE%E7%91%9E%E5%85%8B%C2%B7%E9%9C%8D%E5%B8%83%E6%96%AF%E9%82%A6" title="艾瑞克·霍布斯邦">艾瑞克·霍布斯邦</a>. <a class="external text" href="http://ouleft.org/wp-content/uploads/How_to_Change_the_World_Hobsbawm.pdf" rel="nofollow">How to Change the World: Reflections on Marx and Marxism</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. 美國紐哈芬: <a href="/wiki/%E8%80%B6%E9%AD%AF%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="耶魯大學出版社">耶魯大學出版社</a>. 2012年10月30日: 第314頁至第344頁 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0300188202" title="Special:网络书源/978-0300188202"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0300188202</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210103023042/http://ouleft.org/wp-content/uploads/How_to_Change_the_World_Hobsbawm.pdf" rel="nofollow">存档</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>于2021年1月3日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; </li>
<li id="cite_note-321"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-321">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Tim Stanley" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="蒂姆·史丹利"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%92%82%E5%A7%86%C2%B7%E5%8F%B2%E4%B8%B9%E5%88%A9&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="蒂姆·史丹利（页面不存在）">蒂姆·史丹利</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tim_Stanley" title="en:Tim Stanley"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Tim Stanley</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160407225246/http://blogs.telegraph.co.uk/news/timstanley/100244023/the-left-is-trying-to-rehabilitate-karl-marx-lets-remind-them-of-the-millions-who-died-in-his-name/" rel="nofollow">The Left is trying to rehabilitate Karl Marx. Let's remind them of the millions who died in his name</a>. 《<a href="/wiki/%E6%AF%8F%E6%97%A5%E7%94%B5%E8%AE%AF%E6%8A%A5" title="每日电讯报">每日電訊報</a>》. 2013年11月1日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://blogs.telegraph.co.uk/news/timstanley/100244023/the-left-is-trying-to-rehabilitate-karl-marx-lets-remind-them-of-the-millions-who-died-in-his-name/" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2016年4月7日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E8%92%82%E5%A7%86%C2%B7%E5%8F%B2%E4%B8%B9%E5%88%A9%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22Tim+Stanley%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E8%92%82%E5%A7%86%C2%B7%E5%8F%B2%E4%B8%B9%E5%88%A9%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3ETim+Stanley%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft.btitle=The+Left+is+trying+to+rehabilitate+Karl+Marx.+Let%27s+remind+them+of+the+millions+who+died+in+his+name&amp;rft.date=2013-11-01&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E3%80%8A%E6%AF%8F%E6%97%A5%E9%9B%BB%E8%A8%8A%E5%A0%B1%E3%80%8B&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fblogs.telegraph.co.uk%2Fnews%2Ftimstanley%2F100244023%2Fthe-left-is-trying-to-rehabilitate-karl-marx-lets-remind-them-of-the-millions-who-died-in-his-name%2F&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-322"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-322">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">Ben Phillips. <a class="external text" href="https://www.marxists.org/history/erol/ncm-7/cpml-ussr.htm" rel="nofollow">USSR: Capitalist or Socialist?</a>. <a href="/wiki/%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E6%96%87%E5%BA%93" title="马克思主义文库">馬克思主義文庫</a>. 1981年12月 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150629124947/https://www.marxists.org/history/erol/ncm-7/cpml-ussr.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2015年6月29日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=Ben+Phillips&amp;rft.btitle=USSR%3A+Capitalist+or+Socialist%3F&amp;rft.date=1981-12&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E4%B8%BB%E7%BE%A9%E6%96%87%E5%BA%AB&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marxists.org%2Fhistory%2Ferol%2Fncm-7%2Fcpml-ussr.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-323"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-323">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Ingo Elbe" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="伊果·艾貝"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BC%8A%E6%9E%9C%C2%B7%E8%89%BE%E8%B2%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="伊果·艾貝（页面不存在）">伊果·艾貝</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ingo_Elbe" title="en:Ingo Elbe"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Ingo Elbe</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150108194200/https://viewpointmag.com/2013/10/21/between-marx-marxism-and-marxisms-ways-of-reading-marxs-theory/" rel="nofollow">Between Marx, Marxism, and Marxisms – Ways of Reading Marx’s Theory</a>. <li id="cite_note-廣州日報-324"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-廣州日報_324-0"><sup><b>319.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-廣州日報_324-1"><sup><b>319.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">《<a href="/wiki/%E5%B9%BF%E5%B7%9E%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5" title="广州日报">廣州日報</a>》. <a class="external text" href="http://news.xinhuanet.com/world/2008-10/17/content_10206873.htm" rel="nofollow">金融危机“捧热”《资本论》</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%96%B0%E8%8F%AF%E7%B6%B2" title="新華網">新華網</a>. 2008年10月17日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20130114220554/http://news.xinhuanet.com/world/2008-10/17/content_10206873.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2013年1月14日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（简体）网页">（中文（简体））</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E3%80%8A%E5%BB%A3%E5%B7%9E%E6%97%A5%E5%A0%B1%E3%80%8B&amp;rft.btitle=%E9%87%91%E8%9E%8D%E5%8D%B1%E6%9C%BA%E2%80%9C%E6%8D%A7%E7%83%AD%E2%80%9D%E3%80%8A%E8%B5%84%E6%9C%AC%E8%AE%BA%E3%80%8B&amp;rft.date=2008-10-17&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E6%96%B0%E8%8F%AF%E7%B6%B2&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fnews.xinhuanet.com%2Fworld%2F2008-10%2F17%2Fcontent_10206873.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-325"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-325">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">张兴慧. <a class="external text" href="http://news.xinhuanet.com/world/2009-05/05/content_11313495.htm" rel="nofollow">假如马克思还活着……</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%96%B0%E8%8F%AF%E7%B6%B2" title="新華網">新華網</a>. 2009年5月5日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20141124160318/http://news.xinhuanet.com/world/2009-05/05/content_11313495.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2014年11月24日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（简体）网页">（中文（简体））</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%BC%A0%E5%85%B4%E6%85%A7&amp;rft.btitle=%E5%81%87%E5%A6%82%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E8%BF%98%E6%B4%BB%E7%9D%80%E2%80%A6%E2%80%A6&amp;rft.date=2009-05-05&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E6%96%B0%E8%8F%AF%E7%B6%B2&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fnews.xinhuanet.com%2Fworld%2F2009-05%2F05%2Fcontent_11313495.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-326"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-326">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%B0%E7%91%9E%C2%B7%E4%BC%8A%E6%A0%BC%E9%A0%93" title="泰瑞·伊格頓">泰瑞·伊格頓</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://book.douban.com/subject/6529665/" rel="nofollow">《马克思为什么是对的》（[Why Marx Was Right]）</a>. 中國北京: <a href="/wiki/%E6%96%B0%E6%98%9F%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="新星出版社">新星出版社</a>. 2011年7月1日: 全册 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-7513303125" title="Special:网络书源/978-7513303125"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-7513303125</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201115157/https://book.douban.com/subject/6529665/" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（中国大陆）网页">（中文（中国大陆））</span>. <q>《马克思为什么是对的》讲述了：在全球化的背景下，资本主义内部的各种痼疾纷纷显露。从城乡差距、贫富不均到经济掠夺问题，加上全球霸权在金融海啸中显露的腐败，种种迹象显示，让整个世界重新认识、反思马克思主义的契机正在显现。作为一位坚定的马克思主义者，作者特里·伊格尔顿希望厘清人们对马克思主义的错误认识</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E6%B3%B0%E7%91%9E%C2%B7%E4%BC%8A%E6%A0%BC%E9%A0%93&amp;rft.btitle=%E3%80%8A%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E4%B8%BA%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%E6%98%AF%E5%AF%B9%E7%9A%84%E3%80%8B%EF%BC%88%5BWhy+Marx+Was+Right%5D%EF%BC%89&amp;rft.date=2011-07-01&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-7513303125&amp;rft.pages=%E5%85%A8%E5%86%8C&amp;rft.place=%E4%B8%AD%E5%9C%8B%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC&amp;rft.pub=%E6%96%B0%E6%98%9F%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbook.douban.com%2Fsubject%2F6529665%2F&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-327"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-327">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E9%9B%85%E5%85%8B%C2%B7%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E8%BE%BE" title="雅克·德里达">雅克·德希達</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/makesideyouling0000unse" rel="nofollow">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Specters of Marx" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="馬克思的幽靈"><span class="ilh-page">[[:馬克思的幽靈|馬克思的幽靈]]</span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Specters of Marx</span>]]</span>）</span></span>》</a>. 何一 译. 中國北京: <a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E5%9C%8B%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="中國人民大學出版社">中國人民大學出版社</a>. 2008年4月1日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-7300091822" title="Special:网络书源/978-7300091822"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-7300091822</a>. <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/430327347" rel="nofollow"><span title="OCLC">OCLC 430327347</span></a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; </li>
</ol></div>
<h3><span id=".E6.9D.A5.E6.BA.90"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="来源">来源</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;section=32" title="编辑章节：来源">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r61209943">.mw-parser-output .refbegin{font-size:90%;margin-bottom:0.5em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul{list-style-type:none;margin-left:0}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul>li,.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>dl>dd{margin-left:0;padding-left:3.2em;text-indent:-3.2em;list-style:none}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-100{font-size:100%}</style><div class="refbegin columns references-column-width" style="-moz-column-width: 35em; -webkit-column-width: 35em; column-width: 35em;">
<ul><li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E5%BD%BC%E5%BE%97%C2%B7%E8%BE%9B%E6%A0%BC" title="彼得·辛格">彼得·辛格</a>. Marx. 英國牛津: <a href="/wiki/%E7%89%9B%E6%B4%A5%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="牛津大學出版社">牛津大學出版社</a>. 1983年11月24日. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0192875105" title="Special:网络书源/978-0192875105"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0192875105</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%BD%BC%E5%BE%97%C2%B7%E8%BE%9B%E6%A0%BC&amp;rft.btitle=Marx&amp;rft.date=1983-11-24&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0192875105&amp;rft.place=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E7%89%9B%E6%B4%A5&amp;rft.pub=%E7%89%9B%E6%B4%A5%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E9%AE%91%E9%87%8C%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E5%B0%BC%E5%8F%A4%E6%8B%89%E5%A4%AB%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA" title="鮑里斯·尼古拉夫斯基">鮑里斯·尼古拉夫斯基</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/karlmarxmanandfi029120mbp" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx - Man And Fighter</a>. Caven Press. 2007年3月15日. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1406727036" title="Special:网络书源/978-1406727036"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1406727036</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E9%AE%91%E9%87%8C%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E5%B0%BC%E5%8F%A4%E6%8B%89%E5%A4%AB%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA&amp;rft.btitle=Karl+Marx+-+Man+And+Fighter&amp;rft.date=2007-03-15&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1406727036&amp;rft.pub=Caven+Press&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Farchive.org%2Fdetails%2Fkarlmarxmanandfi029120mbp&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%83%A0%E6%81%A9" title="弗朗西斯·惠恩">弗朗西斯·惠恩</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=r_3c34tQm0cC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a>. Fourth Estate Classic House. 2000年2月. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1857026375" title="Special:网络书源/978-1857026375"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1857026375</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114402/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=r_3c34tQm0cC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021-02-01）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%83%A0%E6%81%A9&amp;rft.btitle=Karl+Marx&amp;rft.date=2000-02&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1857026375&amp;rft.pub=Fourth+Estate+Classic+House&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3Dr_3c34tQm0cC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E6%88%B4%E7%B6%AD%C2%B7%E9%BA%A5%E5%85%8B%E8%90%8A%E5%80%AB_(%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB%E5%AD%B8%E5%AE%B6)" title="戴維·麥克萊倫 (政治學家)">戴維·麥克萊倫</a>. <li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><span Marx</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. 英國倫敦: Bookmarks. 2010年1月8日. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1905192687" title="Special:网络书源/978-1905192687"><span <li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a <h2><span id=".E5.BB.B6.E4.BC.B8.E9.96.B1.E8.AE.80"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="延伸閱讀">延伸閱讀</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;section=33" title="编辑章节：延伸閱讀">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span id=".E4.BA.BA.E7.89.A9.E5.82.B3.E8.A8.98"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="人物傳記">人物傳記</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;section=34" title="编辑章节：人物傳記">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61209943" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="refbegin columns references-column-width" style="-moz-column-width: 35em; -webkit-column-width: 35em; column-width: 35em;">
<ul><li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Maximilien Rubel" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="馬科斯米裏安·呂貝爾"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0631157809" title="Special:网络书源/978-0631157809"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0631157809</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" <li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a Marx. 英國倫敦: <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%BE%85%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%87" title="羅德里奇">羅德里奇</a>. 2009年3月13日. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0415435925" title="Special:网络书源/978-0415435925"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0415435925</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E6%96%87%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E5%B7%B4%E5%A5%88%E7%89%B9%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22Vince+Barnett%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E6%96%87%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E5%B7%B4%E5%A5%88%E7%89%B9%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3EVince+Barnett%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft.btitle=Marx&amp;rft.date=2009-03-13&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0415435925&amp;rft.place=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E5%80%AB%E6%95%A6&amp;rft.pub=%E7%BE%85%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%87&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span> <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Achille Loria" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="阿希尔·洛里亚"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%98%BF%E5%B8%8C%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E6%B4%9B%E9%87%8C%E4%BA%9A&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="阿希尔·洛里亚（页面不存在）">阿希尔·洛里亚</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Achille_Loria" title="en:Achille Loria"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Achille Loria</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210103022814/http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）. 美國安娜堡: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="University of Michigan Library" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="密西根大學出版社"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%AF%86%E8%A5%BF%E6%A0%B9%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="密西根大學出版社（页面不存在）">密西根大學出版社</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Michigan_Library" title="en:University of Michigan Library"><span dir="auto" lang="en">University of Michigan Library</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 1920年1月1日 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <h3><span id=".E4.BA.BA.E7.89.A9.E8.A9.95.E8.AB.96"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="人物評論">人物評論</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;section=35" title="编辑章节：人物評論">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a data-foreign-title="Étienne Balibar" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="艾蒂安·巴里巴"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" data-foreign-title="Reading Capital" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="閱讀資本論"><span class="ilh-page">[[:閱讀資本論|閱讀資本論]]</span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span <li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book">Shlomo Avineri. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=UG2bcaExDGkC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">The Social and Political Thought of Karl Marx</a>. 英國劍橋: <a href="/wiki/%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="劍橋大學出版社">劍橋大學出版社</a>. 1968年1月1日. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0521096195" title="Special:网络书源/978-0521096195"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0521096195</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210103023618/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=UG2bcaExDGkC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年1月3日）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=Shlomo+Avineri&amp;rft.btitle=The+Social+and+Political+Thought+of+Karl+Marx&amp;rft.date=1968-01-01&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0521096195&amp;rft.place=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B&amp;rft.pub=%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DUG2bcaExDGkC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>

<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Harry Cleaver" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="哈里·克利夫"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%93%88%E9%87%8C%C2%B7%E5%85%8B%E5%88%A9%E5%A4%AB&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="哈里·克利夫（页面不存在）">哈里·克利夫</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Cleaver" title="en:Harry Cleaver"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Harry Cleaver</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://libcom.org/files/cleaver-reading_capital_politically.pdf" rel="nofollow">Reading Capital Politically</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. <h2><span id=".E5.A4.96.E9.83.A8.E9.80.A3.E7.B5.90"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="外部連結">外部連結</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;section=36" title="编辑章节：外部連結">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>

title="编辑该模板">编</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div style="font-size:110%"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D" title="卡爾·馬克思">卡爾·馬克思</a>和<a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E9%87%8C%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E6%81%A9%E6%A0%BC%E6%96%AF" title="弗里德里希·恩格斯">弗里德里希·恩格斯</a>著作</div></th></tr><tr style="height:2px"><td colspan="3"></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row">馬克思</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;;"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em"></div><table cellspacing="0" class="nowraplinks navbox-subgroup" style="border-spacing:0"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="padding-left:0em;padding-right:0em;"><div style="padding:0em 0.75em;"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E8%AB%96" title="資本論">資本論</a></div></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;;"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Das Kapital, Volume I" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="資本論·第一卷"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E8%AB%96%C2%B7%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E5%8D%B7&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="資本論·第一卷（页面不存在）">資本論·第一卷</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Das_Kapital,_Volume_I" title="en:Das Kapital, Volume I"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Das Kapital, Volume I</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1867年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Das Kapital, Volume II" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="資本論·第二卷"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E8%AB%96%C2%B7%E7%AC%AC%E4%BA%8C%E5%8D%B7&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="資本論·第二卷（页面不存在）">資本論·第二卷</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Das_Kapital,_Volume_II" title="en:Das Kapital, Volume II"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Das Kapital, Volume II</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1885年，死後出版）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Das Kapital, Volume III" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="資本論·第三卷"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E8%AB%96%C2%B7%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%89%E5%8D%B7&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="資本論·第三卷（页面不存在）">資本論·第三卷</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Das_Kapital,_Volume_III" title="en:Das Kapital, Volume III"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Das Kapital, Volume III</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1894年，死後出版）</span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr style="height:2px"><td colspan="2"></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="padding-left:0em;padding-right:0em;"><div style="padding:0em 0.75em;">其他著作</div></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;;"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">《<a href="/wiki/%E8%A0%8D%E5%AD%90%E5%92%8C%E8%B2%BB%E9%87%8C%E5%85%8B%E6%96%AF" title="蠍子和費里克斯">蠍子和費里克斯</a>》（1837年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Oulanem" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="奧蘭尼姆"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%A5%A7%E8%98%AD%E5%B0%BC%E5%A7%86&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="奧蘭尼姆（页面不存在）">奧蘭尼姆</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oulanem" title="en:Oulanem"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Oulanem</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1839年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Тетради по истории эпикурейской, стоической и скептической философии" data-lang-code="ru" data-lang-name="俄语" data-orig-title="關於伊比鳩魯哲學的筆記"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%97%9C%E6%96%BC%E4%BC%8A%E6%AF%94%E9%B3%A9%E9%AD%AF%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E7%9A%84%E7%AD%86%E8%A8%98&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="關於伊比鳩魯哲學的筆記（页面不存在）">關於伊比鳩魯哲學的筆記</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">俄语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A2%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B8_%D0%BF%D0%BE_%D0%B8%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B8_%D1%8D%D0%BF%D0%B8%D0%BA%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B9%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B9,_%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B9_%D0%B8_%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B5%D0%BF%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B9_%D1%84%D0%B8%D0%BB%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%84%D0%B8%D0%B8" title="ru:Тетради по истории эпикурейской, стоической и скептической философии"><span dir="auto" lang="ru">Тетради по истории эпикурейской, стоической и скептической философии</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1839年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<a href="/wiki/%E5%BE%B7%E8%AC%A8%E5%85%8B%E5%88%A9%E7%89%B9%E7%9A%84%E8%87%AA%E7%84%B6%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E5%92%8C%E4%BC%8A%E6%AF%94%E9%B3%A9%E9%AD%AF%E7%9A%84%E8%87%AA%E7%84%B6%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E4%B9%8B%E5%8D%80%E5%88%A5" title="德謨克利特的自然哲學和伊比鳩魯的自然哲學之區別">德謨克利特的自然哲學和伊比鳩魯的自然哲學之區別</a>》（1841年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<a href="/wiki/%E6%AD%B7%E5%8F%B2%E6%B3%95%E5%AD%B8%E6%B4%BE%E7%9A%84%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E5%AE%A3%E8%A8%80" title="歷史法學派的哲學宣言">歷史法學派的哲學宣言</a>》（1842年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%BB%91%E6%A0%BC%E7%88%BE%E6%B3%95%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E6%89%B9%E5%88%A4" title="黑格爾法哲學批判">黑格爾法哲學批判</a>》（1843年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="On the Jewish Question" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="論猶太人問題"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%AB%96%E7%8C%B6%E5%A4%AA%E4%BA%BA%E5%95%8F%E9%A1%8C&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="論猶太人問題（页面不存在）">論猶太人問題</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/On_the_Jewish_Question" title="en:On the Jewish Question"><span dir="auto" lang="en">On the Jewish Question</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1843年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Notes on James Mill" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="詹姆斯·穆勒《政治經濟學原理》一書摘要"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%A9%B9%E5%A7%86%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E7%A9%86%E5%8B%92%E3%80%8A%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB%E7%B6%93%E6%BF%9F%E5%AD%B8%E5%8E%9F%E7%90%86%E3%80%8B%E4%B8%80%E6%9B%B8%E6%91%98%E8%A6%81&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="詹姆斯·穆勒《政治經濟學原理》一書摘要（页面不存在）">詹姆斯·穆勒〈政治經濟學原理〉一書摘要</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Notes_on_James_Mill" title="en:Notes on James Mill"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Notes on James Mill</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1844年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<a href="/wiki/1844%E5%B9%B4%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E5%AD%A6%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%A6%E6%89%8B%E7%A8%BF" title="1844年经济学哲学手稿">1844年經濟學哲學手稿</a>》（1844年，1932年出版）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<a href="/wiki/%E5%85%B3%E4%BA%8E%E8%B4%B9%E5%B0%94%E5%B7%B4%E5%93%88%E7%9A%84%E6%8F%90%E7%BA%B2" title="关于费尔巴哈的提纲">關於費爾巴哈的提綱</a>》（1845年，1888年出版）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="The Poverty of Philosophy" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="哲學的貧困"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E7%9A%84%E8%B2%A7%E5%9B%B0&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="哲學的貧困（页面不存在）">哲學的貧困</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Poverty_of_Philosophy" title="en:The Poverty of Philosophy"><span dir="auto" lang="en">The Poverty of Philosophy</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1847年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Заработная плата (Маркс)" data-lang-code="ru" data-lang-name="俄语" data-orig-title="工資 (卡爾·馬克思)"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%B7%A5%E8%B3%87_(%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="工資 (卡爾·馬克思)（页面不存在）">工資</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">俄语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%97%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D0%BF%D0%BB%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0_(%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%BA%D1%81)" title="ru:Заработная плата (Маркс)"><span dir="auto" lang="ru">Заработная плата (Маркс)</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1847年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Wage Labour and Capital" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="雇傭勞動與資本"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%9B%87%E5%82%AD%E5%8B%9E%E5%8B%95%E8%88%87%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="雇傭勞動與資本（页面不存在）">雇傭勞動與資本</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wage_Labour_and_Capital" title="en:Wage Labour and Capital"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Wage Labour and Capital</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1847年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<a href="/wiki/1848%E5%B9%B4%E8%87%B31850%E5%B9%B4%E7%9A%84%E6%B3%95%E5%85%B0%E8%A5%BF%E9%98%B6%E7%BA%A7%E6%96%97%E4%BA%89" title="1848年至1850年的法兰西阶级斗争">1848年至1850年的法蘭西階級鬥爭</a>》（1850年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="The Eighteenth Brumaire of Louis Bonaparte" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="路易·波拿巴的霧月十八日"><span class="ilh-page"><a href="/wiki/%E8%B7%AF%E6%98%93%C2%B7%E6%B3%A2%E6%8B%BF%E5%B7%B4%E7%9A%84%E9%9B%BE%E6%9C%88%E5%8D%81%E5%85%AB%E6%97%A5" title="路易·波拿巴的雾月十八日">路易·波拿巴的霧月十八日</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Eighteenth_Brumaire_of_Louis_Bonaparte" title="en:The Eighteenth Brumaire of Louis Bonaparte"><span dir="auto" lang="en">The Eighteenth Brumaire of Louis Bonaparte</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1852年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<a href="/wiki/%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E5%AD%A6%E6%89%B9%E5%88%A4%E5%A4%A7%E7%BA%B2" title="政治经济学批判大纲">政治經濟學批判大綱</a>》（1857年至1858年，1939年出版）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<a href="/wiki/%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E5%AD%A6%E6%89%B9%E5%88%A4" title="政治经济学批判">政治經濟學批判</a>》（1859年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Herr Vogt" data-lang-code="de" data-lang-name="德语" data-orig-title="福格特先生"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%A6%8F%E6%A0%BC%E7%89%B9%E5%85%88%E7%94%9F&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="福格特先生（页面不存在）">福格特先生</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">德语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herr_Vogt" title="de:Herr Vogt"><span dir="auto" lang="de">Herr Vogt</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1860年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Theories of Surplus Value" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="剩餘價值理論"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%89%A9%E9%A4%98%E5%83%B9%E5%80%BC%E7%90%86%E8%AB%96&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="剩餘價值理論（页面不存在）">剩餘價值理論</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theories_of_Surplus_Value" title="en:Theories of Surplus Value"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Theories of Surplus Value</span></a></span>）</span></span>》三卷（1862年，1905年至1910年出版）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="第一インターナショナル創立宣言" data-lang-code="ja" data-lang-name="日语" data-orig-title="國際工人協會成立宣言"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B%E5%B7%A5%E4%BA%BA%E5%8D%94%E6%9C%83%E6%88%90%E7%AB%8B%E5%AE%A3%E8%A8%80&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="國際工人協會成立宣言（页面不存在）">國際工人協會成立宣言</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">日语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%BC%E3%83%8A%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%8A%E3%83%AB%E5%89%B5%E7%AB%8B%E5%AE%A3%E8%A8%80" title="ja:第一インターナショナル創立宣言"><span dir="auto" lang="ja">第一インターナショナル創立宣言</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1864年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Value, Price and Profit" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="工資、價格和利潤"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%B7%A5%E8%B3%87%E3%80%81%E5%83%B9%E6%A0%BC%E5%92%8C%E5%88%A9%E6%BD%A4&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="工資、價格和利潤（页面不存在）">工資、價格和利潤</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Value,_Price_and_Profit" title="en:Value, Price and Profit"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Value, Price and Profit</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1865年）</span></li>

</div></td></tr><tr style="height:2px"><td colspan="3"></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row">著作集</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;;"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Marx-Engels-Werke" data-lang-code="de" data-lang-name="德语" data-orig-title="馬克思恩格斯著作集"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E6%81%A9%E6%A0%BC%E6%96%AF%E8%91%97%E4%BD%9C%E9%9B%86&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="馬克思恩格斯著作集（页面不存在）">馬克思恩格斯著作集</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">德语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marx-Engels-Werke" title="de:Marx-Engels-Werke"><span dir="auto" lang="de">Marx-Engels-Werke</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（MEW，1956年至1990年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<a href="/wiki/%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E6%81%A9%E6%A0%BC%E6%96%AF%E6%96%87%E9%9B%86" title="馬克思恩格斯文集">馬克思恩格斯文集</a>》（MECW，1975年至2004年）</span></li>
